column5: PLEASE NOTE - Our calendar was cleared a month ago, and then owner decided to make the home available this summer for guest use. So, there are great weeks available and very reasonable rates for summer vacations.  Full week rentals between June 30, and August 20, will NOT include any cleaning charges.    Fully Furnished 3- bed, 3-bath, home built right on the water, Fish right off the deck where we have installed underwater fishing lights. Great Fishing!
column8: Fish from Deck #1 Open week of July 4th
